kmov.com  (WEB - en-US)

The website of KMOV, a CBS affiliate television station covering news, sports, and weather in and around St. Louis, Missouri.

This website generally maintains basic standards of credibility and transparency.
Does not repeatedly publish false content
Gathers and presents information responsibly
Regularly corrects or clarifies errors
Handles the difference between news and opinion responsibly
Avoids deceptive headlines
Website discloses ownership and financing
Clearly labels advertising
Reveals who's in charge, including any possible conflicts of interest
The site provides names of content creators, along with either contact or biographical information

Ownership and Financing

KMOV is owned by Meredith Corporation, a Des Moines-based magazine publisher and television broadcaster that bought Time Inc. in 2017. Meredith owns 16 local television stations around the U.S., many of which are affiliated with Fox and CBS.

KMOV lists its reporting staff but does not disclose its ownership and does not provide information about who is in charge of its website content. It runs corrections. KMOV did not respond to NewsGuard’s two emails and one phone call seeking comment on its lack of disclosure about its owners and leadership.
